title: TMSP Impact analysis for Q2
description:
Description
1. Epic Description
Epic (Requirement and Scope) 
This epic focuses on the continuous analysis and adaptation required for our M2M Reporting system in response to changes introduced by the TMSP Source system with each Release . The objective is to ensure seamless integration and functionality by proactively identifying, assessing, and implementing necessary adjustments based on the TMSP side updates.
With the frequent updates and enhancements made to the TMSP, M2M reporting system must remain robust and adaptable. This epic encompasses a series of activities aimed at monitoring, analyzing, and responding to these changes to maintain data integrity, system performance, and overall reliability of our reporting capabilities.
The key goals and activities within this epic include:
Continuously track and document all changes introduced by the TMSP system with each release or sprint.
Maintain a comprehensive change log detailing the nature and scope of updates. 
Conduct thorough impact analysis for each identified change, evaluating how it affects M2M Reporting.
Identify potential risks, data discrepancies, and performance issues that may arise from the TMSP changes.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand the implications of TMSP updates on reporting requirements.
Gather and document new or modified requirements needed to accommodate TMSP changes.
Develop and implement necessary changes or enhancements in our reporting system to align with TMSP system updates.
Perform rigorous testing to ensure the implemented changes do not introduce new issues and that the system operates seamlessly with the TMSP.
Update relevant documentation to reflect changes made to the M2M Reporting system in response to TMSP changes.
Communicate the impact and adjustments clearly to all relevant stakeholders to ensure alignment and awareness.
Identify opportunities for process improvements in handling Source system changes.
Implement best practices for efficient impact analysis and system adaptation.
  Todo:
After each TMSP release implementation, create a user story to review and refine the impact analysis.
Validate that all identified changes have been addressed and integrated appropriately.
Conduct a retrospective to gather feedback and improve future impact analysis and adaptation processes.
Benefits
Ensures M2M Reporting remains robust and can adapt smoothly to TMSP changes.
Minimizes risks of data discrepancies and maintains high data quality.
Streamlines the process of integrating TMSP updates, reducing downtime and operational disruptions.
Identifies potential issues early, allowing for timely interventions and mitigations.
  Specific Deliverables  
None
Acceptance Criteria (conditions which must be satisfied for the Epic to be accepted)
Impact analysis is performed.
Reporting system is adapted to changes
Out of Scope
Development of new features or functionalities.
Dependencies 
TMSP changes list should be available.
Changes should be communicated in advance.

Data and access must be secured throughout the deployment, with compliance to security standards.
4. SLA(if any)
